A

areEqual(GdxRandom, GdxRandom) - Static method in class com.github.tommyettinger.cringe.GdxRandom
Given two GdxRandom objects that could have the same or different classes, this returns true if they have the same class and same state, or false otherwise.

G

GapShuffler<T> - Class in com.github.tommyettinger.cringe
Meant to take a fixed-size set of items and produce a shuffled stream of them such that an element is never chosen in quick succession; that is, there should always be a gap between the same item's occurrences.
GapShuffler() - Constructor for class com.github.tommyettinger.cringe.GapShuffler
 
GapShuffler(Array<T>) - Constructor for class com.github.tommyettinger.cringe.GapShuffler
Constructor that takes any Array of T, shuffles it with an unseeded RandomAce320, and can then iterate infinitely through mostly-random shuffles of the given collection.
GapShuffler(Array<T>, GdxRandom) - Constructor for class com.github.tommyettinger.cringe.GapShuffler
Constructor that takes any Array of T, shuffles it with the given GdxRandom, and can then iterate infinitely through mostly-random shuffles of the given collection.
GapShuffler(Array<T>, GdxRandom, boolean) - Constructor for class com.github.tommyettinger.cringe.GapShuffler
Constructor that takes any Array of T, shuffles it with the given GdxRandom, and can then iterate infinitely through mostly-random shuffles of the given collection.

Constructor that takes any Array of T, shuffles it with the given GdxRandom, and can then iterate infinitely through mostly-random shuffles of the given collection.
GapShuffler(Array<T>, GdxRandom, int, boolean, boolean) - Constructor for class com.github.tommyettinger.cringe.GapShuffler
Constructor that takes any Array of T, optionally shuffles it with the given GdxRandom (only if initialShuffle is true), and can then iterate infinitely through mostly-random shuffles of the given collection.

Copy constructor; duplicates other, you know the deal.
GapShuffler(T) - Constructor for class com.github.tommyettinger.cringe.GapShuffler

Constructor that takes any Array of T, shuffles it with an unseeded RandomAce320, and can then iterate infinitely through mostly-random shuffles of the given collection.
GapShuffler(T[], long) - Constructor for class com.github.tommyettinger.cringe.GapShuffler
Constructor that takes any Array of T, shuffles it with a RandomAce320 seeded with the given long, and can then iterate infinitely through mostly-random shuffles of the given collection.
GapShuffler(T[], GdxRandom) - Constructor for class com.github.tommyettinger.cringe.GapShuffler
Constructor that takes any Array of T, shuffles it with the given GdxRandom (such as a TricycleRandom or WhiskerRandom), and can then iterate infinitely through mostly-random shuffles of the given collection.

Constructor that takes any Array of T, shuffles it with the given GdxRandom, and can then iterate infinitely through mostly-random shuffles of the given collection.
GdxRandom - Class in com.github.tommyettinger.cringe
A superset of the functionality in Random, meant for random number generators that would be too bare-bones with just Random's methods.

L

leap() - Method in class com.github.tommyettinger.cringe.RandomAce320
Jumps extremely far in the generator's sequence, such that one call to leap() advances the state as many as Math.pow(2, 48) calls to RandomAce320.nextLong().
leap() - Method in class com.github.tommyettinger.cringe.RandomXMX256
Jumps extremely far in the generator's sequence, such that it requires Math.pow(2, 64) calls to leap() to complete a cycle through the generator's entire sequence.

P

PI - Static variable in class com.github.tommyettinger.cringe.MathSupport
The float value that is closer than any other to pi, the ratio of the circumference of a circle to its diameter.
PI_INVERSE - Static variable in class com.github.tommyettinger.cringe.MathSupport
1.0f divided by MathSupport.PI.

A random number generator that guarantees 4-dimensional equidistribution (except for the quartet with four zeroes in a row, every quartet of long results is produced exactly once over the period).

scramble(long) - Static method in class com.github.tommyettinger.cringe.Scramblers
Given a long x, this randomly scrambles x, so it is (almost always) a very different long.
scrambleBounded(long, int) - Static method in class com.github.tommyettinger.cringe.Scramblers
Given a long x and an int bound, this randomly scrambles x, so it produces an int between 0 (inclusive) and bound (exclusive).
scrambleDouble(long) - Static method in class com.github.tommyettinger.cringe.Scramblers
Given a long x, this randomly scrambles x to get a pseudo-random double.
scrambleFloat(long) - Static method in class com.github.tommyettinger.cringe.Scramblers
Given a long x, this randomly scrambles x to get a pseudo-random float.
scrambleGaussian(long) - Static method in class com.github.tommyettinger.cringe.Scramblers
Given a long x, this randomly scrambles x to get a pseudo-random double with a Gaussian distribution (a "bell curve" distribution centered on 0.0 with standard deviation 1.0).
scrambleLong(long, long, long) - Static method in class com.github.tommyettinger.cringe.Scramblers
Given a long x and a bound as two longs, this randomly scrambles x and returns a pseudorandom, uniformly distributed long value between the specified inner bound (inclusive) and the specified outer bound (exclusive).
Scramblers - Class in com.github.tommyettinger.cringe
Static methods that can take any long as input and produce a very different, but deterministically chosen, number of some type.
